title: Twisted Fate skin

embed.description: The card wielding cavalier known as Twisted Fate is a warrior that hails from Demacia, originally designed by Guinsoo and voiced by Owen Thomas. Based loosely on the Gambit character from the comic book series X-Men, Twisted Fate is on the run from Kalista and has many allies and enemies throughout Freljord.

body: I am wondering about where i could achieve/get this skin besides mystery gifting. Thats about it

replies.body:
Hey Oceanic Man,

As a Legacy skin, it can come out of the vault at any time. Most frequently they bring out lots of skins for Halloween and Christmas (it was available on sale during December). Other than that, Mystery Skins is the only way to get it. Just keep an eye out for bundles and sales.

-DTN
Was it available on the last christmas sale?
